docs.text: Vultr Docs This repository hosts code samples and support files for Vultr Docs . If you would like to write articles for Vultr Docs, please review these resources: The Request for Article (RFA) list Vultr Docs Program Guidelines Vultr Docs Style Guide
docs.title: About Vultr Docs

docs.text: Request for Article (RFA) List If you are looking for topic inspiration, Vultr has many writing opportunities available! Please see our Request for Article list below. If you are new to Vultr Docs, we suggest working on some articles that need updates before choosing a topic from our new article list. 👉 See the Submission Process section to learn how to get started. New Article Requests RFA# Status Description #643432812 Open How to redirect from server IP address to domain name on Vultr One-Click WordPress App with Nginx #647085292 Open How to Deploy a MERN Application at Vultr Articles that Need Updates RFA# Status Description #646022891 Open How to Install RabbitMQ on CentOS 7 #644036625 Open Setup 7 Days to Die Server on Ubuntu 14 #644027681 Open Install Let's Encrypt SSL on LAMP & LEMP #643423386 Open How to Install OpenMeetings on Ubuntu 16.04 #643416786 Open Install PostgreSQL On CentOS 7 #643416786 Open Install PostgreSQL On CentOS 7 #648909225 Open How to Install and Configure Concourse CI on CentOS 7 Submission Process If you plan to write one of the articles below, please: Review our program guidelines and the style guide . Join the Vultr Trusted Author program . Request the article assignment using this form . Include Request for Article and the RFA number in the Request topic. Include your name and email address so we may contact you. Include any information that may help us select the best candidate for the assignment. When your article is ready for review please upload it to the Vultr Docs team . Please include Request for Article and the RFA number in the Additional Information field. Publication and Payment Responding to an open RFA, or accepting an RFA assignment does not create an obligation by Vultr to publish your article. You may be asked to make changes or corrections, or the team may decline to publish your article without a detailed explanation. Payment is determined according to Vultr’s payment guidelines and article quality .
docs.title: Request for Article

docs.text: If you plan to write one of the articles below, please: Review our program guidelines and the style guide . Join the Vultr Trusted Author program . Request the article assignment using this form . Include Request for Article and the RFA number in the Request topic. Include your name and email address so we may contact you. Include any information that may help us select the best candidate for the assignment. When your article is ready for review please upload it to the Vultr Docs team . Please include Request for Article and the RFA number in the Additional Information field.
docs.title: Submission Process

docs.text: Responding to an open RFA, or accepting an RFA assignment does not create an obligation by Vultr to publish your article. You may be asked to make changes or corrections, or the team may decline to publish your article without a detailed explanation. Payment is determined according to Vultr’s payment guidelines and article quality .
docs.title: Publication and Payment
